title: Trump launches $TRUMP memecoin days before inauguration, generating $320M in fees
summary: Donald Trump launched his $TRUMP cryptocurrency memecoin just days before his inauguration, generating over $320 million in fees for his crypto venture. The coin's market value surged to billions within hours, with Trump holding 80% of the supply. Trump offered exclusive access to top coin holders, including a private dinner for the 220 largest investors at his $500,000 access club, creating an unprecedented pay-for-access scheme using cryptocurrency.

sources.title: Warren Reads 100 Acts of Trump Corruption into Congressional Record
Trump launches official memecoin, sparking ethics concerns
